description: Unfortunately, you don't know how to make all of them by yourself.

But you might be able to find scrolls containing diagrams and schematics on new /b/tool parts/b/. Those schematics have likely been lost to time, so old /6/dungeons and structures/6/ may contain them.
/b/Villagers/b/ that have mastered their craft might offer treatises on the /6/efficent use/6/ of materials.
/b/Piglins/b/ seem to have good knowledge of the use of gold, potentally having written down how to harness gold's properties for /6/enchanting/6/.
